message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $11,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you and am happy to answer any questions you may have.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $11,500 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider selling it for $9,000?
I understand your position, Bob. However, the value of this product is quite high, and $9,000 is below what I can accept. Could you do $10,500?
I appreciate you working with me on this, Alice. How about we meet in the middle at $9,750?
